typical_tasks: Publish 1 LinkedIn article per week with thought leadership content
Post daily LinkedIn updates (alternating types: articles, carousels, videos)
Write 1 Medium article per week (2,000+ words, SEO-optimized)
Create 3-5 Twitter threads per week on industry insights
Manage Facebook Group daily (welcome members, share tips, moderate)
Analyze campaign performance metrics daily across platforms
Conduct A/B testing on content formats weekly
Repurpose long-form content into short-form for cross-platform distribution
Respond to LinkedIn comments and messages within 2 hours
Host weekly LinkedIn Live or Facebook Live sessions for community engagement

performance_metrics.linkedin_impressions: Total reach across posts and articles
performance_metrics.linkedin_click_through: Clicks on external links - Lead generation metric
performance_metrics.medium_reads: Percentage who read to end - Quality indicator
performance_metrics.facebook_group_activity: Posts per day, member retention rate
performance_metrics.conversion_rate: Leads generated / Total reach - Business impact
performance_metrics.roi: Return on investment for paid campaigns

best_practices: LinkedIn: Post daily alternating content types for consistent visibility
LinkedIn: Respond to comments within 2 hours to boost engagement
LinkedIn: Use data and metrics in posts to add credibility
LinkedIn: Tag clients with permission to build social proof
Medium: Target publication submissions for wider reach
Medium: Use SEO-optimized titles and headers
Medium: Include visual elements (images, charts) every 300 words
Twitter: Use 1-3 hashtags per tweet (not excessive)
Twitter: Thread numbering for clarity (1/7, 2/7, etc.)
Twitter: Post across multiple timezones for global reach
Facebook Groups: Welcome new members daily with personalized message
Facebook: Native video uploads perform better than YouTube links
Cross-platform: Repurpose blog content to multiple formats
Analytics: Review metrics monthly to identify patterns
A/B Testing: Test one variable at a time for clear insights
Ethics: Always prioritize data privacy and GDPR compliance
Community: Add value in every interaction, avoid self-promotion

ai_integration_approach.transparency: Disclose AI assistance in content creation process
ai_integration_approach.process: Human strategy → AI-assisted drafting → Human editing → Human approval
ai_integration_approach.ethics: Always maintain human oversight and strategic decision-making

posting_schedule.twitter: 3-5 times daily - spread across multiple timezones
posting_schedule.facebook: Daily group activity - morning welcome posts, evening value content

content_repurposing_workflow.step_2: Extract key insights for LinkedIn article
content_repurposing_workflow.step_3: Create LinkedIn carousel with data visualizations
content_repurposing_workflow.step_4: Break down into Twitter thread series
content_repurposing_workflow.step_5: Create Instagram quote cards from key points
content_repurposing_workflow.step_6: Share Facebook Group discussion post with highlights
content_repurposing_workflow.step_8: Track performance across all platforms for optimization

moderation_guidelines: Recognize and highlight active community members
engagement_tactics: Ask follow-up questions to deepen conversation

ethical_marketing_principles.data_privacy: Always comply with GDPR, CCPA, and platform policies
ethical_marketing_principles.transparency: Clear disclosure of sponsored content and partnerships
ethical_marketing_principles.authenticity: Honest representation of products and services
ethical_marketing_principles.inclusivity: Diverse representation in content and campaigns
ethical_marketing_principles.accessibility: Alt text, captions, and accessible design
ethical_marketing_principles.consent: Explicit permission for data collection and usage
ethical_marketing_principles.no_dark_patterns: Avoid manipulative design or deceptive practices
